summary: Initial full-stack Internet Computer (Motoko + React) app scaffolded with authorization utilities, Internet Identity authentication hooks, multi-page marketing site (Home/Solutions/About/Contact), services browsing UI, contact form, and build/deploy templates; includes generated brand/hero image assets.
architectural_notes: Frontend uses React + Vite with Tailwind styling and a shared SiteLayout (header/footer).
Authentication flow relies on Internet Identity; frontend constructs authenticated canister actors via hooks.
Backend is a Motoko canister with reusable authorization/access-control modules.
Build/deploy scaffolding includes dockerized and ICP CLI-oriented templates plus image resize/prune scripts.
known_issues: Reported issue: user-provided logo/branding was not updated or reflected in the deployed site.
Deployed site is still showing the wrong logo; user requests removing the current logo and using the previously shared Linex Automation logo instead.

existing_features.title: Motoko backend canister scaffold with authorization mixins
existing_features.description: Backend canister project includes authorization utilities (MixinAuthorization, access-control) and main canister entrypoint wiring.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication integration (frontend hooks)
existing_features.description: Frontend includes hooks/utilities for Internet Identity login and authenticated actor creation (useInternetIdentity, useActor) plus query helpers.

existing_features.title: Multi-page React site with shared layout (header/footer)
existing_features.description: React app includes SiteLayout with SiteHeader/SiteFooter and pages for Home, Solutions, About, and Contact.

existing_features.title: Services browsing UI with cards, filters, and detail panel
existing_features.description: Services content and UI components implemented to display service offerings with filtering and detail view panel.

existing_features.title: Contact page with contact form component
existing_features.description: Contact page includes a dedicated ContactForm component for user inquiries.

existing_features.title: SEO and UX utility hooks
existing_features.description: Includes SEO helper hook and motion/UX utilities such as reduced-motion detection and scroll reveal component.

existing_features.title: Build/deploy templates for IC project (Dockerfile, scripts, canister configs)
existing_features.description: Repository includes build-template assets (Dockerfile, deploy.sh, icp.yaml, workspace configs) and scripts for image processing (resize/prune).

existing_features.description: Generated PNG assets included under frontend/public/assets/generated for hero automation image, logo, and services icons sprite.
